spell_tooltip.description: When Shield Slam is used on targets that are casting, it reduces their damage done by 15% for 8 sec and the cooldown is instantly reset.
Reduces the cooldown of Demoralizing Shout by 15 sec, and Demoralizing Shout now reduces the damage enemies deal to all targets, not just you.
Thunder Clap roots all targets it damages for 4 sec.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 16% and all magic damage you take by an additional 6%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto attacks generate 50% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage, and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 102,958 damage and healing you for 20% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 40,974 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards, and resetting the remaining cooldown on Taunt.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 49,361 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.
Causes the targeted enemy to cower in fear, and up to 5 additional enemies within 8 yards to flee. Targets are disoriented for 8 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

While you are below 35% health, restores 1.0% health every 1 sec. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec, and Heroic Leap now also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.00% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 12 yards for 120,093 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 40% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

enerates 5 Rage.

f you have Rend, Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Raise your shield, reflecting the first spell cast on you, and reduce magic damage you take by 25% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 53,250 damage and stunning all enemies within 16 yards for 2 sec.
Thunder Clap's radius is increased by 50%, and it reduces movement speed by an additional 20%.
Cooldown of Shield Wall, Pummel, Intervene, Spell Reflection, and Storm Bolt reduced by 5%.
Shield Slam deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Shockwave's range increased by 6 yards and when Shockwave strikes at least 3 targets, its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Your auto-attacks have a 20% chance to hurl weapons at your target and 3 other enemies in front of you, dealing an additional 43,677 Physical damage.
Increases the maximum number of charges on Charge by 1, and reduces its cooldown by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind or Thunder Clap or Revenge hits 3 or more enemies, it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While wielding one-handed weapons your damage is increased by 12% and Leech increased by 8%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 8% of your Armor.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

enerates 10 Rage.
Avatar increases the damage of Thunder Clap and Shockwave by 50% and reduces the cooldown of Thunder Clap by 50%.

Fight through the pain, ignoring 50% of damage taken until 1.1 million damage has been prevented.

Repeated uses of Ignore Pain accumulate, up to 3.8 million total damage prevented.

Swing in a wide arc, dealing 144,780 Physical damage to all enemies in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Your successful dodges and parries have a chance to make your next Revenge cost no Rage.

Demoralizes all enemies within 15 yards, reducing the damage they deal to you by 25% for 8 sec.

enerates 20 Rage.
Your auto attacks deal an additional 84,211 Physical damage and have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Increases maximum health by 30% for 15 sec, and instantly heals you for that amount.
Defensive Stance additionally reduces magic damage you take by 6%.
Devastate, Thunder Clap, Revenge, and Execute have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Using Shield Slam increases the damage of Shield Slam by 10% and the block value of your shield by 5% for 16 sec. Stacking up to 3 times.
Taunts all enemies within 10 yds to attack you for 6 sec.

Devastate deals 20% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Devastator deals 10% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Wounds the target, causing 68,011 Physical damage instantly and an additional 154,168 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

hunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Damage from Deep Wounds has a chance to generate 5 Rage.
10% of damage you deal adds to your active Ignore Pain.

Increases the radius of Demoralizing Shout by 5 yards.

Each enemy hit by Thunder Clap reduces the remaining cooldown on Demoralizing Shout by 1.5 sec, up to 4.5 sec.
Reduces all damage you take by 40% for 8 sec.
You are able to block spells for 30 sec.
You gain 2% Haste for each enemy or ally within 10 yards, up to 8% Haste.
Shield Block lasts 2 sec longer.
Every 10 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Avatar and Shield Wall by 1 sec.
Shield Slam reduces the remaining cooldown of Shield Wall by 6 sec.
Shield Slam deals 10% increased damage, and reduces enemies' damage against you by 3% for 9 sec. Multiple punishments may overlap.
Increases Strength and Armor by 5% and your critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases Block chance by 24% and your Block value by 48%.
Increases Stamina and Armor by 8% and your Haste by 2%.

Charge to an enemy with your shield, dealing 728,007 Physical damage to it and 234,915 Physical damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

Also stuns the primary target for 4 sec.

enerates 20 Rage.
Demoralizing Shout also generates 20 Rage, and increases damage you deal to affected targets by 20%.
Your maximum health is increased by 6%, and every 20 Rage you spend heals you for 1% of your maximum health.
Every 250 rage you spend triggers a Violent Outburst, causing your next Shield Slam or Thunder Clap to deal 200% increased damage, generate 50% more Rage and grant Ignore Pain.

When your health is brought below 30%, you take 80% less damage for 8 sec and healing you receive is increased by 100%.

Cannot occur more than once every 3 min.

Damaging enemies with Thunder Clap, Revenge, or Execute has a 25% chance to also strike one with a lightning bolt, dealing 188,717 Nature damage and generating 3 Rage.

Lightning Strikes occur 30% more often during Avatar.

Stormstrike or Nature damage your abilities deal is increased by 5%. Stormstrike damage ignores Armor.

Thunder Clap damage increased by 40%. 

Seismic Reverberations now affects Thunder Clap in addition to Whirlwind.
Lightning Strikes also deal 54,048 to enemies near their target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Shield Slam damage increased by 10%.

Demoralizing Shout reduces damage enemies deal to you by an additional 5%.

Shield Slam and Bloodthirst have a 35% chance to grant you Thunder Blast, stacking up to 2 charges.

cffffffffThunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals 40% increased damage as Stormstrike and generates 8 Rage.
Storm Bolt also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning them for 2 sec, but its cooldown is increased by 10 sec.

Stamina increased by 5%.

Impending Victory increases your maximum health by 10% for 5 sec. When this health increase expires, you heal for any amount of the original Impending Victory that healed you in excess of your full health.
Thunder Blast calls down a Lightning Strike on an enemy it hits.

Lightning Strikes generate 3 Rage.

Revenge and Execute damage increased by 25%.
Lightning Strikes have a 15% chance to make your next 2 Shield Slams have no cooldown.

Casting Avatar grants you 2 charges of Thunder Blast and resets the cooldown of Thunder Clap.

While Avatar is not active, Lightning Strikes have a 10% chance to grant you Avatar for 6 secs.

cffffffffThunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage.
Rampage, Onslaught, and Odyn's Fury damage reduce healing the target receives by 3% for 20 sec, stacking up to 12 times.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 16% and all magic damage you take by an additional 6%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.
Leech increased by 3%.
Run at high speed toward an ally, intercepting all melee and ranged attacks against them for 6 sec while they remain within 10 yds.

Instantly attack the target, causing 101,290 damage and healing you for 20% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 41,534 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards, and resetting the remaining cooldown on Taunt.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 49,023 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec. Also hits 2 additional nearby targets, stunning for 2 sec.
Causes the targeted enemy to cower in fear, and up to 5 additional enemies within 8 yards to flee. Targets are disoriented for 8 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec, and Heroic Leap now also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.00% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Raise your shield, reflecting the first spell cast on you, and reduce magic damage you take by 25% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 52,304 damage and stunning all enemies within 16 yards for 2 sec.
Stamina increased by 10% and Armor increased by 10%.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 699,654 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

enerates 8 Rage.

A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 665,360 Physical damage.

enerates 12 Rage.
Enrage increases your Haste by 15% and increases your movement speed by 10%.
Reduces damage taken by 30%, and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health. Usable while stunned or incapacitated. Lasts 8 sec.
Execute no longer costs Rage and now generates 20 Rage.
Bloodthirst damage increased by 10%.
Bloodthirst always Enrages you the first time you strike a target, and it has a 15% increased chance to trigger Enrage.
You take 10% reduced damage while Enrage is active.
Enraged Regeneration lasts 3 sec longer and instantly heals for 10% of your maximum health.
Your attacks have a chance to reset the cooldown of Execute and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.
While Enraged, Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage.
While Enraged, your auto-attacks can no longer miss.
Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 1 million Physical damage.
Raging Blow has 2 charges and has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage, and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches 212,684 health over 6 sec.
Rampage increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 4 times. This effect is reset if you Rampage a different primary target.
Raging Blow causes every strike of your next Rampage to deal an additional 20% damage, stacking up to 5 times.
Bleed damage of Odyn's Fury, Thunderous Roar, Bloodbath, and Gushing Wound increased by 20%.
Go berserk, increasing all Rage generation by 100% and granting your abilities 20% increased critical strike chance for 12 sec.
